column4: oh, It's ok when I ping from laptop to desktop but ping from laptop to Internet (Google's IP for example) yields "connect: Network is unreachable" msg. Why is that? Still fighting with Internet connection sharing
sounds like your dns setting is not correct on the laptop. try pinging the web site via its ip#
did it - ping -c 4 209.85.229.99 (Google's IP) yields network is unreachable
then that points to your default route being incorrect I think.
